entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Cape George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 1:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1 with temperature falling to minus 12 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries along the Strait. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. A few flurries along the Strait. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
